title.rendered: Contract award notice granted for the procurement of the operation of the Stockholm metro system

content.rendered:
Stockholm Region Public Transportation Authority (SL), which is responsible for public transportation services in the Stockholm region, has granted a contract award notice for the operation of the Stockholm metro system. The procurement has been described as the largest non-military public procurement in the world.

The assignment was awarded to Connecting Stockholm AB after a competitive sourcing process with a total of four tenderers. Connecting Stockholm AB’s main owners are Go-Ahead of the UK and ComfortDelgro of Singapore. The assignment includes e.g. traffic operation, rolling stock maintenance, customer-oriented services and other maintenance services. The duration of the contract is eleven years.

The Stockholm metro carries more than a million passengers every weekday through a hundred stations. The assignment’s value is estimated to approximately SEK forty billion.

Mannheimer Swartling advised SL in the procurement project.
